Hi, I’m Christophe Estanol and I’m a Ruby on Rails Developer. Learn more about me. Have a look around and please don’t hesitate to contact me with any comments, questions, or just to say hello!

Sales and marketing profesional turned full stack Rails developer with a passion to explore and problem solve. I am currently seeking new challenges where I can learn from world class developers and collaborate in solving challenging technical problems. I recently completed an intensive development program.

Technologies: Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS, Git, Heroku, Redis.
